mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t2.title, t2.summary, t2.thumbnail, t1.createTime, t2.link FROM MsgEntry t1 LEFT JOIN Msg t2 ON t2.id = t1.msgId WHERE t1.isActive = 1 AND t2.isActive = 1 AND t1.UserId = #{userId} AND t1.isReaded = 0
